name: MathGuru
0:
”Alexa start Math Guru”
”Alexa tell Math Guru to start subtraction”
”I don't know”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math guru
des:
This skill asks the player a series of basic arithmetic math card questions; addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. It picks random numbers between 0 and 9 for the questions. 

Just say the answer. 
For example: 
Alexa says, "What is 9 + 9?"
You answer, "18"
Alexa says, “Correct, what is…”

While practicing, you can also say things like:
“I don’t know”
“I want to do [addition, subtraction multiplication, division, or random]”
“Repeat”
“Stop”
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
